__e: You make up this story about demons talking to you through plastic animals... when nothing talks to you, just like nothing talks to me.
Is it some devil that crawls inside of you?
The fiend who took my foot!
When god sends you a blessing like this, you open up your arms and you embrace it. My father is the devil, and you just spread your legs for him.
Relax. lt's me, your lover not some demon, not your father.
I know he's the devil, as do you.
